package_info.mp_subtitle: This module is tailored for developers to easily create new modules based on existing ones. With just a few clicks and a little of typing, it saves a huge amount of time.
package_info.mp_description:
The Tool Creator offers customized solutions:
- Single table with modal edition
- Single table with tab edition
- Dual table with modal edition
- Dual table with tab edition
You can set the title, description, table columns, editable/mandatory fields, field titles, tooltip descriptions and translations of the tool you build.
